data.expected_result: The Configure option should not be present as you cannot open the Server Settings panel in the Overlay
data.short_description: [Overlay] Configure option is present on Discord automated welcome messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable New Member Messages in a server you have Manage Server permission in from your client - Have a new user join the server - Open the Overlay in a game and go into the channel the welcome message is in - Click on the three dots to bring up the message context menu on the message and observe
